profileAlternative.name: Kevin Scott
profileAlternative.headline: Author of Deep Learning In Javascript
profileAlternative.summary:
I specialize in helping small (< 20) tech teams lay a strong web & mobile foundation, with particular emphasis on React/Redux technologies.

I'm available for part-time consulting, as well as training and mentoring opportunities.

I wrote a book, Deep Learning in Javascript: https://dljsbook.com
